name: test-junior-fullstack
description: You will be required to build a web application that allows users to load a CSV file with preformatted data and display the data as cards on the website. The application should also include a search bar that allows users to search for data within the loaded CSV file.

scripts.install: concurrently "cd client && npm install" "cd server && npm install"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm start" "cd server && npm run nodemon"
